metadata.name: Bank Transaction
metadata.description: Structured bank transaction entry including counterparty, amount, and classification.

transaction_id.description: Identifier assigned to the transaction in the source system.

booking_date.description: Date the transaction was booked by the financial institution.

value_date.description: Value date on which the amount impacts the account balance.

entry_type.description: Booking classification or operation description supplied by the bank.

counterparty_name.description: Name of the counterparty involved in the transaction.

counterparty_account.description: IBAN of the counterparty when available.

counterparty_bank.description: Identifier of the counterparty's financial institution.

description.description: Detailed text description from the bank statement.

amount.description: Signed monetary amount of the transaction.

balance_after_transaction.description: Account balance directly after the transaction was applied.

manual_entry.description: True when the transaction was entered or adjusted manually by a user.

source_system.description: Originating import connector or source system.

attachments.description: References to supporting documents such as invoices or receipts.
